title: high ping issues
body:
can riot get indian players to lower pings like below 100
cause currently we r playing at 200-220

replies.body:
There are a lot of factors that play into what latency (ping) you see to a server. The most impacting factors for players in India are physical distance from the server (2 seconds is pretty quick to go from India to America) and network routing between the two locations. Unfortunately, there are some problematic nodes between India and NA, and this can also cause latency rises. At the moment, ~200 is realistically about as good as it gets without some huge overhauls (upgrades) to some of the network infrastructure between India and the NA servers.

Let me know if you have any questions.
